title: Cluster 2: Ruins of Las Vegas
description: Dedicated to reviving Project Shield and fighting the aliens that occupy Earth, Novak and several team members discover the ruins of Las Vegas beyond the mountains and attempt to locate a Project Shield lab there.When new data is found regarding a project the old world Air Force ran at Area 51, the team may have discovered a way to take the fight to the aliens. Project Phoenix could mean the liberation of mankind. The second Cluster story. 10,500 words.
author: Rider England
